name: AdChainRegistry

scripts.test:
if [ -e rpc_pid.txt ] ; then kill `cat rpc_pid.txt` ; fi 
 nohup testrpc > /dev/null 2>&1 & 
 echo $! > rpc_pid.txt 
 truffle test 
 if [ $? != 0 ] ; then exit 1 ; fi 
 kill `cat rpc_pid.txt` 
 rm rpc_pid.txt

author: Irene Lin <irene.lin@consensys.net>, Mira Zeitlin <miranda.zeitlin@consensys.net>, Yorke Rhodes <yorke.rhodesiv@consensys.net>
